entries.name: Aqshy Ingredient
entries.description:
Generic ingredient used in channeling Aqshy.

Ingredient's price depends on spell for which it is destined. Set price to X ss, where X is equal to spell's CN.

entries.name: Azyr Ingredient
entries.description:
Generic ingredient used in channeling Azyr.

Ingredient's price depends on spell for which it is destined. Set price to X ss, where X is equal to spell's CN.

entries.name: Bodkin Arrow
entries.description: Armour piercing arrow used by military in battles, designed to counter some armour worn by enemy combatants.

entries.name: Bodkin Bolt
entries.description: Armour piercing bolt used by military in battles, designed to counter some armour worn by enemy combatants.

entries.name: Breastplate
entries.description: Breastplate is a type of plate armour that covers only front portion of torso.

entries.name: Broad Bolt
entries.description: Bolt with heavy, broad head that can cause heavy blunt trauma to the target.

entries.name: Chamon Ingredient
entries.description:
Generic ingredient used in channeling Chamon.

Ingredient's price depends on spell for which it is destined. Set price to X ss, where X is equal to spell's CN.

entries.name: Cracker Bullet
entries.description: Bullet for use with sling, that upon impact cracks with tiny explosion sending fragments in every direction.

entries.name: Cuirass
entries.description: Cuirass covers both front and back of torso and thus provides a better protection.

entries.name: Gambeson
entries.description: A gambeson is a padded defensive jacket, worn as armor separately, or combined with mail or plate armor. Gambesons are produced with a sewing technique called quilting. They are usually constructed of linen or wool; the stuffing varied, and could be for example scrap cloth or horse hair.

entries.name: Gambeson Coat
entries.description: A gambeson is a padded defensive jacket, worn as armor separately, or combined with mail or plate armor. Gambesons are produced with a sewing technique called quilting. They are usually constructed of linen or wool; the stuffing varied, and could be for example scrap cloth or horse hair.

entries.name: Gambeson Shirt
entries.description: A gambeson is a padded defensive jacket, worn as armor separately, or combined with mail or plate armor. Gambesons are produced with a sewing technique called quilting. They are usually constructed of linen or wool; the stuffing varied, and could be for example scrap cloth or horse hair.

entries.name: Ghur Ingredient
entries.description:
Generic ingredient used in channeling Ghur.

Ingredient's price depends on spell for which it is destined. Set price to X ss, where X is equal to spell's CN.

entries.name: Ghyran Ingredient
entries.description:
Generic ingredient used in channeling Ghyran.

Ingredient's price depends on spell for which it is destined. Set price to X ss, where X is equal to spell's CN.

entries.name: Hedgecraft Ingredient
entries.description:
Hedgecraft ingredients can be foraged (Rulebook, page 127) using Lore (Herbalism). Upon successful foraging roll, you receive 1 + SL ingredients.

You cannot cast any Hedgecraft spell without an ingredient.

entries.name: Hunting Arrow
entries.description: Specially designed arrows for hunting game and other big prey. It's wide and heavy arrowhead cuts deep into the flesh and can be very lethal, but range is heavily reduced.

entries.name: Hunting Bolt
entries.description: Specially designed bolts for hunting game and other big prey. It's wide and heavy arrowhead cuts deep into the flesh and can be very lethal, but range is heavily reduced.

entries.name: Hysh Ingredient
entries.description:
Generic ingredient used in channeling Hysh.

Ingredient's price depends on spell for which it is destined. Set price to X ss, where X is equal to spell's CN.

entries.name: Leaf Arrow
entries.description: Standard arrow of decent quality. Doesn't have the armour piercing capabilities of military variant, but is very close to it.

entries.name: Long Gambeson
entries.description: A gambeson is a padded defensive jacket, worn as armor separately, or combined with mail or plate armor. Gambesons are produced with a sewing technique called quilting. They are usually constructed of linen or wool; the stuffing varied, and could be for example scrap cloth or horse hair.

entries.name: Military Arrow
entries.description: Standard arrow used by military in battles, designed to deeply pierce skin.

entries.name: Needle Bolt
entries.description: Wooden bolt, designed to deeply pierce skin and preferably break upon impact.

entries.name: Shoddy Arrow
entries.description: Arrow of bad quality, often crafted without proper equipment. Usually used by the poor, brigands and rustlers.

entries.name: Shyish Ingredient
entries.description:
Generic ingredient used in channeling Shyish.

Ingredient's price depends on spell for which it is destined. Set price to X ss, where X is equal to spell's CN.

entries.name: Standard Bolt
entries.description: Most commonly used bolt without metal head or with head of softer iron.

entries.name: Ulgu Ingredient
entries.description:
Generic ingredient used in channeling Ulgu.

Ingredient's price depends on spell for which it is destined. Set price to X ss, where X is equal to spell's CN.

entries.name: Witchcraft Ingredient
entries.description:
Ingredient's price depends on spell for which it is destined. Set price to X bp, where X is equal to spell's CN.

Alternatively, successful foraging (Rulebook, page 127) roll using Outdoor Survival grants you 1 + SL ingredients.

Channelling or casting spells from this Lore automatically results in the Minor Miscast, unless cast with an ingredient. On top of that, Ingredient provides no protection if you roll a Miscast.
